metadata.name: Two-Stage Agent Review Workflow
metadata.description: A generic LangGraph implementation that runs a React agent to generate initial output, then uses a review agent to evaluate that output. If the review is satisfactory, the workflow finishes. Otherwise, it sends feedback back to the original agent for revision.
metadata.author: LangGraph Implementation

max_iterations.description: Maximum number of review iterations to prevent infinite loops

model_name.description: Name of the language model to use

enable_review.description: Whether to enable the review stage
